column2: NYSE cancels irregular trades in Anadarko stock - Bloomberg May 17 The New York Stock Exchange canceled trades in Anadarko Petroleum Corp after a blip in trading cut the market value of the company by 99 percent
column3: according to a report in Bloomberg.

column2: CORRECTED-UPDATE 2-Investor group calls on SEC to review change in JPMorgan voting NEW YORK
column3: May 17 Pension and endowment managers on Friday called on U.S. regulators to review the rules for shareholder voting after a firm collecting ballots for JPMorgan Chase & Co cut off the bank's opponents from polling information.

column2: New Xbox more than a game console for Microsoft * Renews contest with Sony
